name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in deploying cloud infrastructure using **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **Terraform** to build scalable, resilient systems. Experienced in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and utilizing monitoring tools such as **DataDog**, **Grafana**, and **Prometheus** to ensure system reliability.
Skilled in scripting with **Bash** and proficient in database management with **PostgreSQL**. Strong capabilities in automation with **Ansible** and data streaming using **Kafka**. Additionally, a strong full-stack background with hands-on expertise in **Python** and various frameworks, including React, Next.js, Vue, Node.js, FastAPI, and Django. Proven track record in developing AI/ML-powered solutions, complying with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
